title: Natural Healing Show - Medical Intuitive Healer - Atlanta & Worldwide
author: Catherine Carrigan
cleaned_text: The Natural Healing Show for UK Health Radio with Host Catherine Carrigan Welcome to videos of The Natural Healing Show for [UK Health Radio](http://ukhealthradio.com) with host Catherine Carrigan. [The Natural Healing Show ](https://www.ukhealthradio.com/blog/program/natural-healing-show-with-catherine-carrigan/)empowers you to achieve exceptional levels of health and well-being through discovering the healing power of nature and natural health. Every week, the Natural Healing Show reaches over 47,000 unique listeners from all over the world on UK Health Radio, which has over 1 million listeners every month. At the Natural Healing Show we hear from the world's leading experts about how you can heal yourself naturally. Learn drug-free alternatives from the realms of energy healing, nutrition, shamanism, herbalism, naturopathy, flower essences, aromatherapy, plant medicine, kinesiology, sound healing, natural vision improvement, yoga, tai chi, qi gong, meditation, breathwork, movement therapy, Feng shui, biological dentistry, NLP, homeopathy, food healing, spiritual healing, sleep improvement, brain integration, art therapy and natural healing remedies from all over the world. The Natural Healing Show was founded & previously presented by Yara Ghrewati from Wildeye Adventures. The [videos of our interviews are shared on an evergreen basis on our Youtube channel at this link.](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLMypu8d1Ekddpd8b84PRWRkxVnZOTcqoo) Follow The Natural Healing Show through the social media at the following links: [Natural Healing Show on UK Health Radio](http://ukhealthradio.com/blog/program/natural-healing-show-with-catherine-carrigan/) [Download the FREE app to listen to UK Health Radio on your iPhone or iPad at this link.](https://itunes.apple.com/us/developer/uk-health-radio-network/id803810985) By now, I've recorded 200+ interviews! Not all will fit on this page. To watch them all, please subscribe and visit the [Natural Healing Show Page on Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLMypu8d1Ekddpd8b84PRWRkxVnZOTcqoo) Natural Healing Show's Latest Episode
